message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to counteroffer at $110.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $110.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $115.
